info.name: File Labels
info.summary: User-specific labels for files with sensitive content hiding
info.description:
This app allows users to attach key-value labels to files. Labels are user-specific, meaning each user manages their own labels independently.
Key features: - User-specific labels (not shared between users) - Key-value pairs for flexible metadata - Hide previews for files labeled as sensitive (solid placeholder, no data leakage) - WebDAV integration for client sync - OCS API for programmatic access
Example use cases: - Mark files as sensitive to hide previews entirely - Personal organization (project=work, status=todo) - Ratings and reviews - Custom workflows
info.author: Jeff
